effects.description: Apply 5 True damage to any item equipped on the target
Inflict Healing Down (half healing) for 1 round
Apply 5 True damage to all items equipped on the target
Target takes 5 additional damage from all sources for 2 rounds
Inflict Hyper-accelerated and @Movement Up 3 for 1 round
Creates a 1m circular AoE of difficult icy terrain under creature and knock them @Prone
Inflict @Rooted for 2 rounds
Inflict Slowed 2 for 2 rounds
Damage chains to 1 target within 3 meters for half damage
Inflict Dice Down  2 for next attack
Inflict Dice Down 1 for 1 round
For the next round, any Action this creature takes that consumes AP provokes an Attack of Opportunity
Inflict 1d6 Burning for the encounter Interruptible
Create a 1 square fire pool dealing 1d6 fire damage at target creature’s feet that lasts for the encounter
Inflict 2d6 Burning for the encounter Interruptible
Inflict Healing Down 50% for the next healing target receives
The next time you use the same ability that triggered this effect, it costs 1 less AP
Grant AP Gain Up 1 to an ally within line of sight for 1 round
Gain 3 AP. Each time this effect is chosen in one round, reduce it by 1 AP
Burn 2 Class Resources from the target
Increase damage dealt by this attack by 1d6
Inflict Isolated for 1 round
Inflict Healing Reduction (convert to damage) for the next heal target receives
For target’s next roll, they must roll twice and use the lower number of successes. They may not use re-rolls on that roll.
Inflict Prone
Inflict Movement Down 3 for 1 round
Inflict Hobbled and Prone
Target has an object in their hand or on their person knocked 1d6 squares away
Heal yourself or an ally you can see for 1d6
All allies that can see the target gain Dice Up 1 for their next roll
Inflict Blinded for 1 round
Inflict Feared / Repelled for 1 round
Inflict Taunted for 1 round with you or any allied target as the taunting creature
Make an opposed primary check vs the target. If you win, dispel one effect cast by the target.
Inflict Confused for 1 round
Inflict Pacified All or Taunted and Enraged with any creature as the taunter for 1 round
Inflict Dice Down 1 for 2 rounds that applies to FIT or SPD
Inflict Damage Debuff All for 1 round
Inflict Slowed 4 for 1 round
Inflict Dice Down 1 to RES for 2 rounds
Inflict AC Down 2 for the next attack
Target is pushed up to FIT or Primary Stat squares backwards or sideways
Inflict AC Down 2 for 1 round and target is knocked Prone
Target must pass a Resistance save or be Unconscious . Save can be repeated at the end of the target’s turn.
Attack deals half damage to targets adjacent to the area of effect
Target is pushed 1d6 squares or knocked prone
Increase the radius of the AoE of the attack by 1 square, you may repeat this choice
Add Damage: Pierce / Penetration FIT or Primary Stat to this attack
Apply Movement Down 1 for the encounter
Apply a Called Shot effect of your choice that costs 1 or 2 successes
Convert the attack to a critical
Inflict Bleed 3 for 3 rounds
You gain ReRoll Up 1 for any attacks against this target until the end of your next turn
Inflict Bleed 4 and @Dice Down 1 for 3 rounds
Inflict 3 True damage to one natural armor or equipment
Increase damage dealt by 1. You can take this multiple times.
